entries.title: Why I Build
entries.body: I build because creating something functional from nothing excites me.

modal.title: Why I Build
modal.subtitle: Motivation & direction
modal.body:
I build because creating something functional from nothing excites me.

Whether it’s a small game, a web app, or a backend system, I enjoy designing logic, writing code, and watching an idea become a real, usable product.

I don’t just want to know how things work — I want to make them work.
